official_title: To amend the country of origin marking law requiring that imported manhole rings of frames, covers, and assemblies thereof be marked on the top surface.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to revise the country of origin marking law requiring that imported manhole rings, frames, or covers be marked on the top surface.

titles.title: To amend the country of origin marking law requiring that imported manhole rings of frames, covers, and assemblies thereof be marked on the top surface.
